All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AvailabilityController
Controller for the availability screen.
ClientApp
Entry point for launching the client side application of BPARK.
ClientAware
Interface for JavaFX controllers that need access to the ClientController.
ClientController
This is the main client-side controller responsible for managing the connection to the server.
ClientRequestSender
This class is in charge of sending requests from the client to the server.
ConnectController
Controller for the "Connect to Server" screen.
CreateNewOrderViewController
Handles the "Create New Reservation" workflow for subscribers Collects date, time and subscriber code, checks availability with the server, and finally builds an Order object.
DBController
DBController handles all DB operations related to the BPARK database.
DragUtilClient
Utility class for enabling drag-to-move functionality for undecorated JavaFX windows.
DragUtilServer
Utility class for enabling drag-to-move functionality for undecorated JavaFX windows.
EditSubscriberDetailsController
Controller for editing a subscriberג€™s personal details.
ExtendParkingController
Controller for the "Extend Parking Time" screen.
GuestMainController
Controller for the guest home screen shown to users who are not logged in.
GuestMainLayoutController
Controller for the main layout shown to guest users.
LoginController
Controller for handling the login workflow.
MailService
Service class responsible for sending emails through Gmail SMTP.
MainController
Entry screen of BPARK.
ModeSelectionController
Controller for the mode selection screen.
MonthlyReportGenerator
Unified report generator for both Parking and Subscriber reports.
MonthlyReportScheduler
A unified scheduler that handles: 1.
Operation
Represents all the types of operations (requests) that the client can send to the server.
Order
A model class that represents a single parking order, as stored in the 'Order' table in the database.
ParkingEvent
A data class representing a parking session, stored in the 'parkingEvent' table.
ParkingEventChecker
A background thread that checks for overdue parking sessions.
ParkingLot
A simple data class that represents a parking lot in the BPARK system.
ParkingReport
A simple data holder for parking-related statistics, typically used in generating summary reports.
ParkingReportController
Controller for the parking report screen.
ParkingReservationSummaryController
Controller for the reservation summary screen.
ParkingSpace
A basic class that represents a single parking space in the system.
RegisterSubscriberController
Controller for the staff-facing registration screen.
ResponseType
Represents all possible types of responses the server can send to the client.
Server
Represents the BPARK server.
ServerApp
Launches the BPARK server GUI and starts the socket server after the user enters a port.
ServerController
Controller for the BPARK server connection screen.
ServerResponse
Represents a generic response sent from the server to the client.
StaffMainController
Dashboard header for staff roles (Attendant / Manager).
StaffMainLayoutController
Main layout for staff users (Attendant / Manager).
StageAware
Interface for controllers that need access to the main Stage.
StatusOfOrder
Represents the current status of an order made by a subscriber.
Subscriber
This class represents a subscriber in the BPARK system.
SubscriberMainController
Home screen a subscriber sees right after login.
SubscriberMainLayoutController
Main container for every subscriber screen.
SubscriberStatusController
This controller handles the Subscriber Status report screen.
SubscriberStatusReport
Represents one subscriber's status for a specific month.
TerminalMainController
Landing screen shown on the physical terminal.
TerminalMainLayoutController
Main layout for the physical terminal (kiosk) used by subscribers at the parking lot.
TypeOfMail
Defines the different types of emails that can be sent by the system.
UiUtils
A utility class that provides reusable methods for JavaFX UI management.
User
Represents a user in the BPARK system.
UserRole
Enumeration of all user roles in the BPARK system.
Vehicle
Represents a vehicle that can enter and park in the BPARK system.
VehicleDeliveryController
VehicleDeliveryController class responsible for the process of delivering the vehicles in the BPARK system.
VehiclePickupController
Handles the "Retrieve Vehicle" flow at the terminal.
ViewActiveParkingInfoController
Controller for displaying the subscriber's current active parking event.
ViewActiveParkingsController
Controller for the staff-facing screen that displays all currently parked vehicles.
ViewParkingHistoryController
Controller for the screen that displays a subscriberג€™s parking history.
ViewSubscriberDetailsController
Controller for the screen that displays the subscriber's personal details.
ViewSubscribersInfoController
Controller for the staff screen that displays a full list of subscribers.
WatchAndCancelOrdersController
Controller for the "My Reservations" screen.
